other_tests.findings: Elevated CSF 3OMD level due to L-Dopa therapy; significant reductions of the CSF HVA level and the HVA/5HIAA ratio suggested a TH deficiency.
A compound heterozygous point mutation was discovered in both brothers (1127C/H11022T in exon 10, 1493A/H11022G in exon 14).

other_tests.date: At age 46 years (Patient 1); At age 26 years (Patient 2); At age 41 years (Patient 2)
other_tests.findings: Normal in Patient 1 at 46 years; mild cognitive impairment in Patient 2 at 26 years; unchanged neuropsychological assessment at age 41.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Patient 1 showed normal findings over time; Patient 2 experienced mild impairment.

other_tests.date: At age 24 years (Patient 1); At age 46 years (Patient 1); At age 12 years (Patient 2); At age 41 years (Patient 2)
other_tests.findings: Severe generalized dystonia at age 24 in Patient 1; discrete generalized choreatic movements and slightly increased muscle tone at age 46; moderate gait problems at age 26 in Patient 2; inability to stand or walk, bradykinesia, generalized dystonia at age 42 in Patient 2.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Patient 1 showed improvement with L-dopa therapy; Patient 2 demonstrated a decline in mobility and condition over the years.
